title: Hyuga
description: Desktop utility for organizing and managing printed assets. Built with TypeScript and Electron for a seamless cross-platform experience.

title: CreeperKeeper
description: Open source Minecraft server management service. Spin up servers on-demand and pay only for what you use. Built with Go backend and AWS infrastructure managed by Terraform.

title: Terraform Minecraft Module
description: Published Terraform module for spinning up EC2 instances to host Minecraft servers. Uses itzg/minecraft-server Docker image for easy configuration.

title: Neovim Config
description: Custom Neovim configuration built from scratch. A deep dive into LSPs, linters, debuggers, and low-level IDE tooling. Licensed under Apache 2.0.

title: NetherTravel
description: A utility tool to help calculate optimal travel routes through the Minecraft Nether dimension. Simplifies coordinate conversion and portal placement.

title: Tech Deep Dives
description: Educational content and study guides for software engineering concepts. Created as teaching material for aspiring developers.
